title: [Self-Directed] Information Design-Based Science Learning Experience Design: Utilizing Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Concepts and Basic Digital Tool Usage
context.additional_context: Operating with personalized BYOD devices, focusing on science experiment simulations and VR content.

learning_goals: Learners can visually and spatially represent scientific concepts by applying information design principles.
Learners can systematically analyze and explain complex scientific phenomena in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can enhance their ability to solve scientific problems using digital materials integrated with multimodality (text/image/sound).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
